channel.title: ~~the quest for an ice barrage~~
channel.description:
Hey everyone, this is kind of a question i have to ask about runescape. Its sort of a math question.
Ok, I have 83 mage (2731660 xp) and im trying to find out how many curse spells it will take to get to 94 mage. I think that it would be around 180 thousand casts. Is that right? if not can u plz help me and figure out, just how many curse spells it will take to get 94 mage.
P.S Curse spell gives 29 xp per cast.
Thanks in Advance :D ;) :D ;) :D ;)

item.title: ~~the quest for an ice barrage~~
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Your fingers will fall off.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~the quest for an ice barrage~~
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

RLN:

about 200 hours

Yea, I’m actually not sure where the 6 hours came from.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~the quest for an ice barrage~~
item.dc:creator: @RLN RLN
item.description:
@RLN wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:20, topic:161007”]179758 Curses to get to level 94.
Don’t know how much the runes are, so let’s assume it’s 20 ea cast. That makes it 3.6m.
If you cast it once every 4 seconds (wear the highest melee armor you can to get the lowest mage bonus), it should only take you 6 hours of straight macroing.[/quote]about 200 hours

Read full topic

item.title: ~~the quest for an ice barrage~~
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Dizzy, post:26, topic:161007”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=219076.msg1914206#msg1914206 date=1196827701]

I’d say if you have 80+ mage and you’ve already done DT, macroning is out of the question. IMO.

You should agreee with me, you’re legit. o_O

80+ mage is the best time to macro.

First of all, you really NEED to macro to get higher without stabbing yourself in the eyes.

Second, SRL is safe.

Third, no one expects you to macro at such a high level.

Just ask indiestyle about macroing at high levels.
[/quote]

From experience, they always expect players of all levels to be potential macro users. But yes, it could be less of a chance that you’d be flagged or anything.[/quote]

You are only flagged if you are caught macroing. And, as legit said, SRL is safe considering all it does it click at colors.

Read full topic
